DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect consultation train program physician quality consultation breast cancer patient regard complementary medicine . We assume train program might enhance communication relevant information , empathy physician satisfaction consultation .
DOC.brief_title: KOKON Consultation Complementary Medicine Oncology - Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria physician : age > 18 year work breast center comprehensive cancer center able consult 10 patient within work hour train group : able participate onsitetraining primarily treat patient consult good language skill ( consultation ) inform consent Inclusion Criteria patient : age > 18 year female diagnosis breastcancer patient participate center good language skill ( consultation ) inform consent
